dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: In a world where magic and technology coexist, the city of New Atlantis is plagued by a mysterious energy crisis.

dialogue.speaker: Lena, the protagonist
dialogue.text: I've been searching for a solution to this crisis for months. I finally have a lead on a powerful artifact that could restore balance to our city's energy.

dialogue.speaker: Kael, the antagonist
dialogue.text: You're just in time to witness my plan unfold. With this artifact, I'll harness its power and become the ruler of New Atlantis!
